page.title: 19LIFE STYLES
page.content: Two remnants of past coaching days are still in operation. "The Balcarres Arms"is a hotel which still has its old coach arch in use. It has a lounge bar, a public bar and a games room with a pool table and a gaming machine. Darts are played in the public bar and the hotel has a team in a darts league. They serve morning coffee,pub lunches and basket suppers. "The Commercial Inn"has a keystone 1721 above the door. They have a lounge bar, a public bar and a gaming machine. They play in the darts league and a domino league and on Saturday nights the clients play for a steak pie prize. They serve morning coffee as well.
